text:
Spill rahasia hidup hemat di tengah bulan dong, Kak! 🤫
Walaupun belum gajian, kamu masih bisa self reward! Dengan berbagai promo menarik dari Grab, kamu bisa tetap jajan, jalan, dan belanja, tanpa harus menguras dompet. Cuss intip berbagai promonya dibawah ini!
Berikut ringkasan perjalanan Grab Anda saat ini
1
0
0
0
Beberapa langkah lagi untuk melengkapi profilmu. Semangat!
Anda dapat langsung mendapatkan poin ekstra OVO points dengan cara menyelesaikan langkah berikut ini
Lengkapi KYC-mu
Tambahkan rekening bank/debit/kartu kredit
Aktifkan OVO
Ada promo tiap jajan & jalan!
Mau dapet promo tiap pesen Grab? Caranya, langganan GrabUnlimited aja, GRATIS selama 8 Minggu. Dapet gratis ongkir GrabFood & diskon jalan s.d. 20% 😍 S&K Berlaku.
Langganan yuk
Gratis ongkir & Diskon jalan di setiap pesananmu
Hari gini masih bayar ongkir? Yuk langganan paket GrabUnlimited! Dapet gratis ongkir tiap jajan GrabFood dan diskon 15%tiap naik GrabCar & GrabBike!
Coba GRATIS 8 Minggu
Mulai dari 5rb udah bisa jalan nyaman ke mana pun 💚
Mau ke mana aja hari ini? Jalannya naik GrabBike Hemat yaa~
Bisa jalan nyaman tanpa kuras kantong pakai GrabBike Hemat! Jalan ke mana aja tarifnya mulai 5 ribu
Jalan Yuk
Aneka fitur penunjang nyamannya perjalananmu
trans:
Hey, spill your secret on how to live frugally in the mid-month! 🤫
Even if you haven't got your payment, you can still do a self-reward! With various interesting promos from Grab, you can still buy snacks, go for a trip, and shop without spending a lot of money. Let's take a look at the various promos below!
Here are the summaries of your Grab trip
1
0
0
0
A few steps more to complete your profile. Fighting!
You can get OVO extra points right away by completing these steps below
Complete your KYC
Add bank account/debit/credit card
Activate OVO
The promo is available every buying snacks & trip around!
Do you want to get a promo every time you order in Grab? Just subscribe the GrabUnlimited, FREE for 8 weeks. Get free shipping for GrabFood with & trip discount of up to 20% 😍 T&C is applied
Let's subscribe
Free shipping cost and driving discount in your every order
Still, pay the shipping cost, nowadays? Let's subscribe to the GrabUnlimited package! Get free shipping for every order from GrabFood and a 15% discount for every order from GrabCar & GrabBike!
Try FREE for 8 Weeks
Starting from 5 thousand you can go comfortably everywhere 💚
Where do you want to go today? Go with GrabBike Hemat, okay~
You can go everywhere comfortably without shelling out your pocket using GrabBike Hemat! Go everywhere, starting from 5 thousand
Let's Go
Various features to help your comfortable trip
